data.title: Knowing Me, Knowing You... With Alan Partridge

Knowing You with Alan Partridge Steve Coogan Patrick Marber Doon Mackichan Rebecca Front David Schneider
data.meta_description: A guide to Knowing Me, Knowing You... With Alan Partridge, the 1992 - 1993 BBC Radio 4 radio sitcom. A spoof chat show hosted by straight talking broadcaster Alan Partridge.
data.text:
Created by several members of the On The Hour team including Steve Coogan, Patrick Marber and Armando Iannucci.

Alan Partridge is given the opportunity to interview famous names from the worlds of sport, politics and entertainment.
